text: Scheßlitz (or Schesslitz; Main-Franconian: Schääz) is a town in the Upper Franconian district of Bamberg and is on the rise to the Franconian Switzerland on the A 70 between Bamberg and Bayreuth, being 14 km northeast of the former. ==References== ==Further reading== * Matthias Wolf: Das Schäätzer Bockäla.
